title: ‘Mammals’ Review: James Corden Gets Back to What He Does Best
description: In “Mammals,” Corden’s first scripted TV comedy in eight years, he plays an angry (and very funny) young man.
dc:creator: Mike Hale
media:description: James Corden and Melia Kreiling play a couple grappling with issues of infidelity in “Mammals,” written by the British playwright Jez Butterworth.
